mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT WI_INDEX,WI_TITLE, WI_REG_DATE, WI_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID FROM WINNER_INTERVIEW ORDER BY WI_INDEX) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT MEMBER_ID, WI_CATEGORY, WI_CONTENT, WI_DRAW_DATE, WI_HIT, WI_INDEX,WI_REG_DATE,WI_TITLE, LAG(WI_TITLE,1,'이전글') OVER(ORDER BY WI_INDEX DESC) AS prevTitle, LAG(WI_INDEX, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY WI_INDEX DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(WI_INDEX, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY WI_INDEX DESC) AS nextNum, LEAD(WI_TITLE,1,'다음글') OVER(ORDER BY WI_INDEX DESC) AS nextTitle FROM WINNER_INTERVIEW ORDER BY WI_INDEX DESC) result1 WHERE WI_INDEX=#{wiIndex}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WINNER_INTERVIEW(WI_INDEX, MEMBER_ID, WI_CATEGORY, WI_CONTENT, WI_TITLE, WI_DRAW_DATE, WI_HIT) VALUES(WINNER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'ADMIN', #{wiCategory}, #{wiContent}, #{wiTitle}, #{wiDrawDate}, 1)
